name: Leap of Faith (Laugic)
description:
You seem to have a bit of trouble with jumping... Try and find something to fix it!

Hold Shift to run.
You jump higher the faster you're moving.

Escape resets the room

F4 toggles fullscreen.

Enjoy!

Credits:
